parties: Scott A. LAICH, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Jeffrey A. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of April, 2011, the order of the Commonwealth Court is hereby AFFIRMED.
Jurisdiction relinquished.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
